alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Clayton; Coweta; DeKalb; Douglas; Fayette; Gwinnett; Heard; North Fulton; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 5:14AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern DeKalb, northern Fayette, southeastern Carroll, southeastern Douglas, south central Gwinnett, north central Heard, northwestern Coweta, Fulton and northern Clayton Counties through 545 AM EST... At 514 AM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Atlantic Station to Lowell, and moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Decatur, Fayetteville, Jonesboro, Peachtree City, East Point, Union City, Forest Park, Riverdale, College Park, Fairburn, Clarkston, Tyrone, Morrow, Hapeville, Stone Mountain, Palmetto, Avondale Estates, Lake City and Lithonia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Clayton; Coweta; DeKalb; Douglas; Fayette; Gwinnett; Heard; North Fulton; South Fulton
